description: This Java class 'SendViaApsAck' extends 'SendCommandRequest' and represents a request to send a command with acknowledgment via the APS (Application Support Sub-layer) in a Zigbee simulation or mock environment. It includes fields for sequence number and overrides execution to notify when an APS acknowledgment is received.

classes.name: SendViaApsAck
classes.description: Represents a request to send a Zigbee command with acknowledgment, extending SendCommandRequest and handling APS acknowledgment notification.

methods.name: SendViaApsAck
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the request with specific parameters including request ID, device EUI64, endpoint, cluster, sequence number, manufacturer ID, command ID, and payload.

methods.name: executeDeviceRequest
methods.description: Executes the send command request on a given MockZigbeeDevice and notifies the system of APS acknowledgment receipt.
